column5: City on a Hill at Spring Creek Â in Fredericksburg, Texas has four deluxe, private cabins overlooking Spring Creek! Although the cabins are only 10 miles from town, guests feel as if they are in another world; a world of pure Texas Hill Country! A king size bed with elegant hill country style bedding and large bathroom. The bedroom/sitting area includes a flat screen TV; kitchenette complete with a convection oven, full size refrigerator, keurig and microwave. Large porch with a private hot tub.
